name: farmhouse pumpkin
notes:
this crochet pumpkin pattern is worked flat with an easy combination of basic stitches, so it’s the perfect choice for beginner crocheters. 

you can whip up a few pumpkins for yourself, or make a whole patch of pumpkins to sell at craft fairs. either way, i know you’ll love this easy fall crochet project.

construction: the pumpkin is crocheted flat in rows, then seamed to create a tube. then, the top of the pumpkin is gathered with a running stitch. after stuffing, the bottom of the pumpkin is gathered in the same way.  \then, the stem is made and attached.
